text: Claus Rasmussen (born 31 December 1957) is a Danish former cyclist. He competed in the 1000m time trial event at the 1984 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1957 births Category:Living people Category:Danish male cyclists Category:Olympic cyclists of Denmark Category:Cyclists at the 1984 Summer Olympics Category:People from Svendborg
title: Claus Rasmussen
